articles.description: This article discusses Capital One's $35.3B deal to buy Discover Financial, PBOC cutting the five-year LPR, latest Houthi attacks in the Red Sea, and Airbus' view on China’s C919.

articles.title: Eva Scherer is joining Daimler Truck from Siemens AG. She'll be the first female CFO in company history
articles.description: Scherer will join the company as finance chief and a member of the board of management on April 1.
articles.content:
Good morning.
Daimler Truck Holding’s board members said they had specific qualities in mind for the firm’s new CFO, who’ll be tasked with guiding the business during a “historic transformation” of the industry.

articles.title: India-Canada diplomatic thaw remains remote despite visa easing
articles.description: Mending frayed diplomatic relations between India and Canada will be a long process after each side adopted maximalist positions, despite New Delhi's surprise move to ease some visa curbs on Canadians.

articles.title: Analysis: Canada may struggle to recoup $26 billion cost of Trans Mountain pipeline
articles.description: Canada faces an uphill battle to recoup the roughly C$35 billion ($25.74 billion) in taxpayers' money it has sunk into the Trans Mountain oil pipeline, as uncertainty over shipping tolls and a limited pool of buyers cloud the asset's unique strategic value.
